Search for Kaizer, Gisborne boy with autism: Bad weather could hinder efforts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-for-kaizer-gisborne-boy-with-autism-bad-weather-could-hinder-efforts/NJWCLWI6PRGUZPGKMYZHDML3TY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-for-kaizer-gisborne-boy-with-autism-bad-weather-could-hinder-efforts/NJWCLWI6PRGUZPGKMYZHDML3TY/ Raphael FranksIncoming thunder and hail storms are increasing the urgency of the search. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:14:02 +0000 Video from the search showed teams in wetsuits wading through rivers, tossing away debris and feeling along the riverbed. A helicopter can also be seen scouring the area from above. Photo / Murray Roberston
The Feelers lead singer James Reid sentenced after third drink driving conviction https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-feelers-lead-singer-james-reid-reveals-battle-against-alcoholism-after-third-drink-driven-conviction/KQI2ZX5HI5ED5HXR44OINH366M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-feelers-lead-singer-james-reid-reveals-battle-against-alcoholism-after-third-drink-driven-conviction/KQI2ZX5HI5ED5HXR44OINH366M/ Anna LeaskThe Feelers lead singer has been sentenced for refusing a blood test. Mon, 12 Aug 2024 04:08:40 +0000 The Feelers frontman James Reid has been in residential treatment for alcoholism. He was sentenced in the Christchurch District Court today for his third drink-driving-related offence. Photo / George Heard
Live updates: Government’s tough new traffic light system for beneficiaries https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-louise-upston-expected-to-make-social-welfare-announcement-following-cabinet-meeting/7GJ4CULU3ZEHXJY3LDNKBCWVJI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-louise-upston-expected-to-make-social-welfare-announcement-following-cabinet-meeting/7GJ4CULU3ZEHXJY3LDNKBCWVJI/ Luxon will be joined by Social Development and Employment Minister Louise Upston. Collection of Te Manawa, courtesy of the Bush Family. All rights reserved.

Photo / Belinda Feek
